abstract: Protests and looting break out in Soweto area of Johannesburg, leading to 70 arrests, after foreign shopkeeper is accused of shooting and killing 14-year-old boy who was reportedly trying to rob shop.
lead_paragraph: About 70 people have been arrested in the Soweto area of Johannesburg over protests and looting, much of it aimed at shops owned by residents from other countries, local news media reported Thursday.
snippet: About 70 people have been arrested in the Soweto area of Johannesburg over protests and looting, much of it aimed at shops owned by residents from other countries, local news media reported Thursday.

headline.main: South Africa: Violence Erupts in Soweto
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Violence Erupts in Soweto
